title: Honey Chipotle Salad Dressing
ingredients: 3/4cups extra-virgin olive oil or avocado oil
1-2chipotles in adobo, plus an extra teaspoon of the adobo sauce
directions: Add all ingredients to a blender or food processor, and puree until smooth. Taste, and add extra honey if you’d like a sweeter dressing.
Use immediately, or refrigerate in a sealed container for up to 1 week.
